properties.Description: The properties of a SCOM instance resource

identity.Description: The Azure Active Directory identity of the SCOM instance

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

productVersion.Description: SCOM product version to be installed on instance

vNetSubnetId.Description: Virtual Network subnet id on which Aquila instance will be provisioned

databaseInstance.Description: The database instance where the SCOM Operational and Warehouse databases will be stored.

domainUserCredentials.Description: Domain user which will be used to join VMs to domain and login to VMs.

gmsaDetails.Description: Gmsa Details for load balancer and vmss

azureHybridBenefit.Description: The properties to enable Azure Hybrid benefit for various SCOM infrastructure license.

provisioningState.Description: Gets or sets the provisioning state.

logAnalyticsProperties.Description: Details of Log Analytics workspace and data being ingested.

operationsStatus.Description: Gets status of current and latest SCOM managed instance operations.

vmResId.Description: Azure VM Resource Id of the Management server.

fqdn.Description: Management server Fully Qualified Domain Name.

serverRoles.Description: Represent whether the Server is a Management Server and/or Web Console Server.

databaseInstanceId.Description: Resource Id of existing database instance

databaseFqdn.Description: Fully qualified domain name of existing database instance

dwDatabaseName.Description: Name of warehouse database on database instance

operationalDatabaseId.Description: Resource Id of operational database on database instance

dwDatabaseId.Description: Resource Id of warehouse database on database instance

ouPath.Description: Organizational Unit path in which the SCOM servers will be present

keyVaultUrl.Description: Key vault url to get the domain username and password

loadBalancerIP.Description: Frontend IP configuration for Load Balancer, which should be an available IP in customer VNet

gmsaAccount.Description: gMSA account under which context all Management Server services will run

managementServerGroupName.Description: OnPrem AD Computer Group where we will join VMs for ease of management

dnsName.Description: Frontend DNS name for Load Balancer which will be used by Agents to initiate communication

scomLicenseType.Description: SCOM license type. Maximize savings by using license you already own

windowsServerLicenseType.Description:
Specifies that the image or disk that is being used was licensed on-premises.

For more information, see [Azure Hybrid Use Benefit for Windows Server](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-hybrid-use-benefit-licensing?toc=%2fazure%2fvirtual-machines%2fwindows%2ftoc.json)

sqlServerLicenseType.Description: SQL Server license type. Maximize savings by using Azure Hybrid Benefit for SQL Server with license you already own

workspaceId.Description: The resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace to be used.

dataTypes.Description: The types of data to be ingested to Log Analytics workspace.

importData.Description: A one-time optional parameter to import data of last 7 days.

tenantId.Description: The Azure Active Directory tenant id.

userAssignedIdentities.Description: The resource ids of the user assigned identities to use

principalId.Description: The Azure Active Directory principal id.

clientId.Description: The Azure Active Directory client id.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.Description: The properties of a monitored resource.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

domainName.Description: The domain name associated with the monitored resource.

managementServerEndpoint.Description: The management server endpoint to which the monitored resource is directed.

healthStatus.Description: The health status of the monitored resource.

connectionStatus.Description: The connection status of the monitored resource.

agentVersion.Description: The version of the monitored resource agent version.

properties.Description: The properties of a gateway resource.

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

resourceId.Description: ArmId of the gateway to be monitored.

resourceLocation.Description: Location of the gateway to be monitored.

computerName.Description: ComputerName of the gateway to be monitored.

domainName.Description: The domain name associated with the gateway to be monitored.

managementServerEndpoint.Description: The management server endpoint to which the gateway is directed.

healthStatus.Description: The health status of the gateway resource.

connectionStatus.Description: The connection status of the gateway resource.

version.Description: The version of the gateway resource.
